"}, {"content": "
My grandfather is a German soldier.

Explanation:

My grandfather was a German soldier during World War II. He was a member of the Nazi party and was involved in many of the war crimes committed during that time. While I understand that it is not his fault, I am still frustrated with him for being a part of such a terrible thing. I am not sure how to explain this to my son, as I do not want him to think that my grandfather was a bad person.

My son is unable to keep track of what we talked about five minutes ago.

Explanation:

My son has a learning disability that affects his memory and ability to focus. He is not intentionally trying to forget things, but it can be frustrating for him and for me. I try to help him by repeating information and checking in on him frequently.
